feed.title: Announcing bip174.org, a web-based PSBT viewer and editor

entry.title: Announcing bip174.org, a web-based PSBT viewer and editor
entry.summary: In this conversation, the discussion is about outputting UR QRs from a website, which is easy as there are multiple libraries in multiple languages to support them. However, major web-based transaction coordinator services are also planning to add browser scanning of PSBTs on laptops with cameras. The conversation ends with a suggestion that reading a PSBT from a QR code using the webcam should be pretty doable.
